002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tpptokenization.entity;
004
005import javax.persistence.Entity;
006import javax.persistence.Table;
007
008import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.entity.ProcessedDocument;
009
010/**
011 * Represents a tokenized text-only document.
012 *
013 * @author Alejandro González García
014 */
015@Entity
016@Table(name = "tokenized_text_document")
017public class TppTokenizedTextDocument extends ProcessedDocument {
018        /**
019         * Creates a new tokenized text-only document with the given parameters.
020         *
021         * @param id   The ID of the tokenized text-only document, that must match the
022         *             ID of a text-only document.
023         * @param text The tokenized text of the text-only document, with tokens
024         *             separated by spaces.
025         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If any argument is {@code null}.
026         */
027        public TppTokenizedTextDocument(final int id, final String text) {
028                super(id, text);
029        }
030
031        /**
032         * Dummy constructor that only assigns a primary key. Intended for usage when
033         * the rest of the entity attributes are to be be assigned later.
034         *
035         * @param id The primary key of the entity.
036         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If {@code id} is {@code null}.
037         */
038        public TppTokenizedTextDocument(final Integer id) {
039                super(id, "");
040        }
041
042        /**
043         * Dummy default constructor, to be used by JPA only.
044         */
045        protected TppTokenizedTextDocument() {}
046}
